note.p: Education: St Paul's School, London; St John's College, Cambridge; BA (1682), MA (1685), MD (1692); Incorporated at Oxford (1690)

Career: Held Jacobite views; Fellow of St John's College, Cambridge; Professor of Physic, Gresham College, London (1689-1692); practised medicine at Lynn, Norfolk; ordained deacon (1697), priest (1698); Rector of Newington Butts (1698); Rector of Wood Norton and Swanton Novers, Norfolk (1698-1708)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; St Paul's; DNB (Benjamin Stillingfleet); Venn; Foster
